results.title: ft.com
results.snippet: Company Overview: Indústrias Romi S.A. is a Brazilian manufacturer of machine tools and plastic processing equipment. They have three business units: ROMI Machines, Burkhardt + Weber Machines (Germany), and Castings and Machined Parts.

results.snippet: Product Portfolio: Romi offers a variety of machine tools, including:

results.title: prnewswire.com
results.snippet: Digital Twin Technology: Rockwell Automation's digital twin technology has helped Falcare Industrial Equipment in Brazil (serving the automotive and machinery sectors) achieve faster project execution, greater precision, and reduced waste. (Note: While this isn't directly about Romi, it highlights the increasing adoption of digital technologies in the Brazilian industrial sector, which may be relevant to Romi's strategy).

results.title: marketscreener.com
results.snippet: Geographic Sales: In 2025, Romi's sales were distributed geographically as follows: Latin America (979M BRL), Europe (336M BRL), North America (40.15M BRL), and Africa and Asia (27.53M BRL). Look for news related to sales growth or new initiatives in these regions.

results.title: made-in-china.com
results.snippet: EU-Mercosur Trade Deal: The EU-Mercosur trade deal could provide Romi with opportunities to expand its trade and investment between Europe and South America.
